Package aom.scripting.xs.xs

Class ExternalSubroutines

Object
ExternalSubroutines
public class ExternalSubroutines
extends Object
This class provides a collection of XS commands that don't fit in any of the subcategories.
Author:
Mythic_Freak - mythic.freak[a]gmail.com

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    bool xsAddRuntimeEvent​(string foo, string bar, int something)
    Sets up a runtime event.
    int xsGetContextPlayer()
    Returns the current context player ID.
    int xsGetFuntionID​(string functionName)
    Runs the secret XSFID for the function.
    int xsGetTime()
    Returns the current game time in milliseconds.

  • Method Details

    • xsGetContextPlayer

      public int xsGetContextPlayer()
      Returns the current context player ID.

    • xsSetContextPlayer

      public void xsSetContextPlayer​(int playerID)
      Sets the current context player ID. Used to retrieve more detailed game info from the new player.
      See Also:
      kbLookAtAllUnitsOnMap()

    • xsGetTime

      public int xsGetTime()
      Returns the current game time in milliseconds. When used in triggers, it return the time in second.

    • xsAddRuntimeEvent

      public bool xsAddRuntimeEvent​(string foo, string bar, int something)
      Sets up a runtime event. Nobody really knows what it does.

    • xsGetFuntionID

      public int xsGetFuntionID​(string functionName)
      Runs the secret XSFID for the function. USE WITH CAUTION.
